title: Mine Forever
description: [Siren The Lynn Hagen ManLove Erotic Alternative Paranormal Romance, M/M, shape-shifters, HEA] Omar has known who his mate is since he was young. The problem is, Kahl has yet to claim him. Taking matters into his own hands, Omar gets a job at Silk Room, hoping to get a reaction out of Kahl. What he gets is one pissed-off dragon. Kahl has fought against claiming Omar since he found out that he could impregnate the man. Omar declared at a young age that he didn't want to have children, and all hopes of starting a family with his human mate died that day. That is, until Kahl decides he's had enough and claims the man he's loved since childhood. Unfortunately, the past has a way of catching up and an old enemy returns, intent on finishing what she started. Kahl must turn to family in order to keep Omar safe as the two try to stay one step ahead of the evil hounding them. ** A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Lynn Hagen
